subtasks: Evaluate animal shelters
Ensure proper food and water for animals
Secure food and water sources for humans
Check infrastructure for potential damage
Secure animals to prevent escape during power outage
Check trees and trim overhanging branches
Prepare alternative heat sources
Stockpile supplies and ensure emergency preparedness
Check on neighbors and community safety
Identify muddy or water-prone areas
Apply mulch to improve safety and accessibility
Regularly break ice and remove from animal water sources
Warm water for animals if possible
Confirm all family members know safety procedures
Ensure accessibility to essential items like flashlights and batteries
Evaluate and reinforce chicken coop shelter
Prepare backup cooking methods
Arrange for generator or alternative heat source support from neighbors
Stay informed about weather changes
Continuously assess preparations as needed
